Reviews.Title: a good phone
Reviews.Author: Caroline Kreiser
Reviews.Content: I don't want a smart phone, I just want a phone I can use as a phone, and as a text messaging device.  This works great.  I've been buying Sony Ericssons for years, and this one continues to serve well.  Seems to have a good, long battery life.

Reviews.Title: charger
Reviews.Author: Brendon
Reviews.Content: The phone works great, but the either the charger or the battery refuses to charge half the time.  Pretty sure it's the charger now because I put in another battery and the charger still won't power up the phone

Bluetooth: Yes, v2.0 with A2DP
Browser: WAP 2.0/xHTML, HTML (NetFront )

Included Accessories: Battery, Charger, 2GB card, Stereo Hands-Free Headset, USB Cable, NO SIM CARD
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson W595 Quad-band Cell Phone - Unlocked (Black)
